content: Hello Aditya Vardhan! It's nice to meet you. What can I help you with today?
I'm Jarvis, a highly advanced AI chatbot, here to assist and provide information to you.

I possess a wide range of features, including but not limited to: answering questions, providing real-time information, generating human-like text, understanding context, and responding accordingly. I'm also capable of processing and understanding natural language, making me a highly conversational AI.
Got it! I'll keep in mind that you're 21 years old, Aditya Vardhan.
what do you mean by append

In general, "append" means to add something to the end of something else. For example, appending a sentence to an essay means adding the sentence to the end of the essay. In computer science, appending data to a file means adding new data to the end of the existing file.
